page_title: "vaultsec_secret_version Data Source - vaultsec"
description: |-
  Data source to retrieve the current version of a secret.
---

# vaultsec_secret_version (Data Source)

Retrieves the current version of a secret from Vault metadata.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vaultsec_secret_version" "example" {
  mount = "secret"
  name  = "my/secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mount` (String) Mount path.
- `name` (String) Secret name.

### Optional

- `key` (String) Key to look up (for consistency).

### Read-Only

- `version` (Number) Current version.
